scale.name: Main Window Scale
scale.description: Changes the scale of the debug window for different sized screens.

debug.name: Debug Mode
debug.description: Turn on debug mode to log debug statements and open the devtools with each window.

dataDebug.name: Debug Data Input
dataDebug.description: Read input data from local data files. The normal Serial connection will be non-functional with this setting on.

driverDebug.name: Serial Driver Debug
driverDebug.description: Use the debug serial driver to input data from a Ground Station Muxer file. The normal Serial connection will be non-functional with this setting on.

video.name: Video Mode
video.description: Turn on to switch the ground station to video streaming mode.

tileCache.name: Toggle Tile Caching (Not Implemented)
tileCache.description: Turn off caching of map tiles to the disk. If disabled, map may not work when offline.

cacheMaxSize.name: Map Cache Size (bytes)
cacheMaxSize.description: The maximum size of the cache for loading tiles offline.

baudRate.name: Serial Port Baud Rate
baudRate.description: The baud rate used when connecting to the radio receiver over serial.
